description: Settlement factions for the Typed Leadership Simulator

factions.name: Unaffiliated
factions.description: Independent settlers without strong faction ties

factions.name: Farmers' Collective
factions.description: Agricultural workers who prioritize food security and peaceful growth. They value hard work, tradition, and community support.

factions.name: Settlement Guard
factions.description: Warriors and defenders who protect the settlement. They value strength, discipline, and preparedness against threats.

factions.name: Temple Circle
factions.description: Priests, healers, and spiritual leaders. They value faith, compassion, and moral guidance for the community.

factions.name: Merchants' Guild
factions.description: Traders, craftsmen, and entrepreneurs. They value prosperity, innovation, and economic growth.
